title: Higher Mathematics Project Based on Online Learning Design and Culturally Relevant Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Project-based education focused on solving real-life problems using mathematics for learners adapted to online learning environments post-COVID-19

learning_goals: Learners can design math problems reflecting cultural contexts in online learning environments
